overview: Courtney Trouble and Angela White have always admired each other -- both as professionals and human beings. After years of being friends, they finally have the chance to take their friendship to the next level. Dressed in hot pink lingerie and high heels, Angela can hardly sit still as she anxiously anticipates Courtney's arrival.  Bunny De La Cruz is working on her suntan when her son's girlfriend, Alina Lopez, shyly interrupts her. Alina is elusive at first as they sit together. She slowly admits that she thinks she has a crush on someone else. Curious, Bunny keeps gently prodding for details until Alina finally admits that she's actually in love with her.
title: Shape of Beauty 4
